title: क्या अमेरिकी राष्ट्रपति डोनाल्ड ट्रंप मोदी के समर्थन में लोगों से वोट मांग रहे है?
author: www.factcrescendo.com
vclaim:
December 10: TRUMP ENDORSES ATIKU

One of the support groups of the PDP presidential candidate known as “Atiku Abubakar 2019” posted a picture of US President @realDonaldTrump allegedly endorsing Abubakar for next year’s election. https://t.co/cS5KOOhi5J #FakeNews pic.twitter.com/e84ThruYgO
